concept.title: 339.203-70 Contract clauses for electronic and information technology (EIT) acquisitions.

conbody.p: (a) The contracting officer shall insert the provision at 352.239-73, Electronic and Information Technology Accessibility Notice, in all solicitations.
(b) The contracting officer shall insert the clause at 352.239-74, Electronic and Information Technology Accessibility, in all contracts and orders.
